img_text: Sprint LTE 87% 7:19 AM Tweet スシズル[キラー] @Shízzel DTF. 24m So people complain about not having the Skull Trooper, mainly because it's "Rare" so they bring it back to make the people happy, just for there to be a SPECIFIC color that you can only use if you bought the outfit when it originally came out a year ago Happy Power HappyPower NEW Purple "OG" Status Color way for the Skull Trooper, this color Is only available to players who bought the Skin Originally!
